Property.name: Restrictions
Property.val: Please refer to the cancer protocol cover page (www.cap.org/cancerprotocols) for information about which tumor types and procedures can be reported using this template.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_48259
DisplayedItem.title: If multiple tumors present, document the size of the largest tumor.

ListItem.name: LI_50448
ListItem.title: G1 (nucleoli absent or inconspicuous and basophilic at 400x magnification)

ListItem.name: LI_53674
ListItem.title: G2 (nucleoli conspicuous and eosinophilic at 400x magnification, visible but not prominent at 100x magnification)

ListItem.title: G3 (nucleoli conspicuous and eosinophilic at 100x magnification)

ListItem.name: LI_56376
ListItem.title: G4 (extreme nuclear pleomorphism and / or multi-nuclear giant cells and / or rhabdoid and / or sarcomatoid differentiation)

ListItem.title: Extends into perinephric tissue (beyond renal capsule)

ListItem.name: LI_21117
ListItem.title: Extends into major vein (renal vein or its segmental branches, inferior vena cava)

Question.title: Lymphovascular Invasion (excluding renal vein and its segmental branches and inferior vena cava)

Section.name: S_17978
Section.title: PATHOLOGIC STAGE CLASSIFICATION (pTNM, AJCC 8th Edition) (Note I)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_47801
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_47801_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

ListItem.name: LI_327849
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_4941
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

DisplayedItem.name: DI_56956
DisplayedItem.title: pT1: Tumor less than or equal to 7 cm in greatest dimension, limited to the kidney

ListItem.name: LI_4943
ListItem.title: pT1a: Tumor less than or equal to 4 cm in greatest dimension, limited to the kidney

ListItem.name: LI_4944
ListItem.title: pT1b: Tumor greater than 4 cm but less than or equal to 7 cm in greatest dimension limited to the kidney

DisplayedItem.name: DI_43282
DisplayedItem.title: pT2: Tumor greater than 7 cm in greatest dimension, limited to the kidney

ListItem.name: LI_21125
ListItem.title: pT2a: Tumor greater than 7 cm but less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension, limited to the kidney

ListItem.name: LI_21124
ListItem.title: pT2b: Tumor greater than 10 cm, limited to the kidney

DisplayedItem.name: DI_45446
DisplayedItem.title: pT3: Tumor extends into major veins or perinephric tissues, but not into the ipsilateral adrenal gland and not beyond Gerota’s fascia

ListItem.name: LI_37793
ListItem.title: pT3a: Tumor extends into the renal vein or its segmental branches, or invades the pelvicalyceal system, or invades perirenal and / or renal sinus fat but not beyond Gerota’s fascia

ListItem.name: LI_4948
ListItem.title: pT3b: Tumor extends into the vena cava below the diaphragm

ListItem.name: LI_4949
ListItem.title: pT3c: Tumor extends into the vena cava above the diaphragm or invades the wall of the vena cava

ListItem.name: LI_4950
ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor invades beyond Gerota's fascia (including contiguous extension into the ipsilateral adrenal gland)

ListItem.name: LI_327851
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327852
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_4953
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_4954
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis in regional lymph node(s)

ListItem.name: LI_21098
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_21098_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)
